conclusion: Analyze the path of each colored liquid as it passes through the baffle system to determine which container it will flow into.
Black liquid flows from the black line above.
Pink liquid flows from the pink line above.
Yellow liquid flows from the yellow line above.
Blue liquid flows from the blue line above.
Each baffle system has baffles positioned to guide the liquids towards the containers below.
Black liquid (A) aligns with the third container from the left, labeled E.
Pink liquid (B) aligns with the second container from the left, labeled F.
Yellow liquid (C) aligns with the first container from the left, labeled G.
Blue liquid (D) aligns with the fourth container from the left, labeled G.
Final destinations: Black liquid (A) -> Container E, Pink liquid (B) -> Container F, Yellow liquid (C) -> Container G, Blue liquid (D) -> Container G.
